turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Yeah, can can you get a pizza order started at Bella Luna for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know, the first one just make it a four cheese pizza and then the second pizza I want an Alfredo sauce pizza. It's just a regular cheese pizza with Alfredo sauce and then the third pizza make that pepperoni, sausage and linguiça and those are those are all small pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, bella luna does not have lenguisa, would you like a meat lovers instead?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No linguiça, huh? No, just just keep it a pepperoni and sausage. That'll be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, so you are ordering 3 small pizzas, one 4 cheese special, one with alfredo sauce and cheese, and one with pepperoni, and sausage, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah three small pizzas, yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $39, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think the amount is fine. But also, make sure those pizzas are thin-crust pizzas if you could.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i can add that to your order and it won't affect your price.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, cool.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that was going to be my next question.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll be picking it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready in 35 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's all I needed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.
